SEARCH
Package Lab3

Class Lab3

java.lang.Object
Lab3.Lab3
public final class Lab3 extends Object
A utility class containing several recursive methods 
 
 For all methods in this API, you are forbidden to use any loops, 
 String or List based methods such as "contains", or methods that use regular expressions
 You must not define any instance variables to solve the problem. 
 You must use direct recursion to solve the problem. (no indirect recursion is allowed).
Author:
EECS2030 Fall 2022

  • Method Details

    • sum

      public static int sum(int start, int end)
      Returns the sum of a consecutive set of numbers from start to end .
      Parameters:
      start - is an integer number
      end - is an integer number
      Returns:
      the sum of start + (start + 1) + .... + end

    • makeString

      public static String makeString(char first, int n)
      This method creates a string using the given char by repeating the character n times.
      Parameters:
      first - is the given character by which the string is made.
      n - is the number of characters in the final string
      Returns:
      a string made of the given character.

    • interlace

      public static String interlace(String first, String second, int n)
      This method gets two strings and interlace a string using the these two input strings. The number of words in the returned string is as much as the value of the third input parameter.
      Parameters:
      first - is the string that is used in the even position of the returned result [asuming that the position starts from zero]
      second - is the string that is used in the odd position of the returned result
      n - is the number of letters in the returned result.
      Returns:
      returns a string made of the first and the second input parameter.

    • getSubstring

      public static String getSubstring(String str, char open, char close)
      This method returns a substring of the given input string that is enclosed in two given characters.
      Parameters:
      str - is a string that contains at least two characters including open and close
      open - is a character at the beginning of the string that should be returned.
      close - is a character at the end of the string that should be returned.
      Returns:
      returns a string enclosed in two given characters of open and close .

    • decimalToBinary

      public static String decimalToBinary(int value)
      This method converts a decimal value into its binary representation.
      Parameters:
      value - is a positive integer number including zero
      Returns:
      the binary representation of the input.
